data.text: @biblioklu @Icelandair @metallidan @Icelandair is trash they stranded me and my mother in Greenland for 15 days and won’t pay me what is owed STAY AWAY FROM ICELANDAIR #boycotticelandair

@Icelandair A wonderful solution for the worsening global food crisis that provides the answer to man's survival!

https://t.co/pohjMMDuoU

Wishing you, your family, and your country happiness in the new year.

I hope you will enjoy the video. Thank you.
@Icelandair Prospective customers for your cheap flight and travel products are active on Twitter! See them here: https://t.co/S9caOIOgrm
@Icelandair You could take the step to keep your passengers and crews as safe as possible, you know that, right?

@Icelandair Well that's a big no thanks..

Was looking forward to my 5th trip back but looks like I'll be waiting and probably not flying Icelandair anytime soon
@biblioklu @Icelandair Yeah I guess I liked the idea of, if I choose to be on a plane at least it’s with some risk mitigated. This is great from a paperwork point of view but I have mixed feelings.
@Icelandair Love it 👏 Makes we want to go back even more 💕
